definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><variables><variable type="Boolean" id="found">found</variable><variable type="Number" id="Xposition">Xposition</variable><variable type="Number" id="Yposition">Yposition</variable><variable type="Number" id="Zposition">Zposition</variable></variables><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="0" y="0"><field name="trigger">no_ext_trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><mutation else="1"></mutation><value name="IF0"><block type="logic_binary_ops"><field name="OP">EQ</field><value name="A"><block type="entity_nbt_logic_get"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="tagName"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">enableGravity</field></block></value></block></value><value name="B"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="entity_set_nogravity"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="gravityValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value></block></statement><statement name="ELSE"><block type="entity_set_nogravity"><value name="entity"><block type="immediate_source_entity_from_deps"></block></value><value name="gravityValue"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">FALSE</field></block></value></block></statement><next><block type="wait"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">20 ticks is 1 second, 100  tics is 5. The bullet will take about 10 seconds before gravity is re enabled if tics are at 200</comment><value name="ticks"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">200</field></block></value><statement
